quotes.quote: The only time you should ever look back is to see how far you've come.
Believing in progress does not mean believing that any progress has yet been made.
Progress changes consciousness, and when people's consciousness changes, then their awareness of what is possible changes as well a virtuous circle.
Every step of progress which the world has made has been from scaffold to scaffold, and from stake to stake.
A work in progress. And the possibilities are endless.
Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
If you want to progress in your life and grow, act not to react.
All progress depends on the unreasonable man.
The only time you should ever look back is to see how far you've come.
The progress of the world depends almost entirely upon education.
The test of our progress is not whether we add more to the abundance of those who have much; it is whether we provide enough for those who have too little.
Progress always involves risks. You can't steal second base and keep your foot on first.
A work-in-progress generates its own energy field. You, the artist or entrepreneur, are pouring love into the work; you are suffusing it with passion and intention and hope.
It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. Let us move forward with strong and active faith.
To achieve progress nature alone counts, and the eye is trained through contact with her. It becomes concentric by looking and working.
Those who do not move, do not notice their chains.
Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
All progress is based upon a universal innate desire on the part of every organism to live beyond its income.
Progress is not an illusion; it happens, but it is slow and invariably disappointing.
All creativity is a work in progress.
The world is moving so fast these days that the man who says it can't be done is generally interrupted by someone doing it.
Progress, however, of the best kind, is comparatively slow. Great results cannot be achieved at once; and we must be satisfied to advance in life as we walk, step by step.
Human beings are works in progress that mistakenly think they're finished.
Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
There's always a work in progress be it in the mind, the soul, the heart, or in your hands.
Do not get rid of your earliest work; do not undo and rework your first efforts. It is good to be able to see progress.
Progress lies not in enhancing what is, but in advancing toward what will be.
Progress is not achieved by luck or accident, but by working on yourself daily.
If progress is to be steady we must have long term guides extending far ahead.
